name: THE PARTNERSHIP TO FIGHT INFECTIOUS DISEASE (PFID)
description: Advocacy for issues related to infectious like AMR
sampleDescriptions: The need for Congress to pass financial incentives for the purpose of encouraging the development of new and novel antibiotics as well as other steps to address AMR.
